['DescriptionValco Properties is pleased to present this exclusive elegant and large sized three bedroom apartment for sale in Skyview Tower, Dubai Marina.
This well sized tidy apartment is best suited for a family looking for the vibrant lifestyle Marina has to offer. Strategically located between Marina & JBR, you are just walking distance away from host of amenities from restaurants, retails, shopping centers, metro, and the beach. This apartment is perfect for a family needing easy access to areas like JLT, Marina, Internet City, Media City, The Greens, and Tecom. 
Property Highlights:
- 3 Bedrooms 
- 5 Bathrooms 
- 1,846 sq ft 
- Views of Marina 
- Near Metro
- Balcony 
- 2 Parking
- High Floor 
- Playing Area
- Gym / Health Club
- Sauna and Steam Room
- Temperature-Controlled Swimming Pool
- 24/7 Security & Concierge
About Marina:
A Mixed-Use development in the heart of Dubai, this bustling cosmopolitan community comprises of high-rise towers, hotels, and retail and restaurants. The dramatic skyline of skyscrapers looks particularly impressive when illuminated at night. The iconic man made marina encompasses several kilometers of walkways that feature retails, hotels, restaurants, and other shopping areas and is ideal for an afternoon stroll or a moonlight walk after a romantic meal. Throughout the day and night, visitors flock to Dubai Marina for its unique selection of restaurants, cafes and shops. It is also popular to hire a yacht to enjoy a cruise around the area. This community is in vicinity of key landmark attractions and malls and is in close proximity to key business centers such as Dubai Internet and Media City and Jebel Ali Free Zone.
Community Highlights:
- Near Metro
- Near Retails, Restaurants and Malls
- Proximity to Key Landmarks and Attractions
- Array of Amenities']

title_advert: ['Vastu B type corner plot close to park']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nMaids Room']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are very pleased to be able to offer this perfectly located type A 4 bedroom townhome situated in a perfect location within the Gardenia development.  Not only does the property occupy a corner plot but it is also fully vastu compliant with a North Easterly facing front door.
The type A is a large townhouse in the Gardenia development and this particular villa has a very private and secluded garden.
The accommodation in full comprises an entrance hall which opens through to the living and dining room, a closed fitted kitchen, guest bedroom with en-suite shower room, laundry room and maids room all on the ground floor.
On the first floor, the master bedroom has a range of fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathroom with separate shower and bath.  There are two further double bedrooms, additional shower room and family room on the first floor.
Outside, the property enjoys the benefit of a 3200 sq ft corner plot and has a very secluded rear garden.  To the front there is covered parking for two cars.
The location of this villa is very convenient as it is within walking distance from the new Ikea mall as well as the metro station.
The seller is asking for an 11% premium
Please call Martin +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae for further information.']
